mapper.select:
select m.*, pm.name parentName from sys_menu m left join sys_menu pm on pm.id = m.parent_id
and m.platform = #{platform} and m.del_flag = 0
and m.visible = #{visible}
order by m.order_num, m.create_time desc

select m.*, pm.name parentName from sys_menu m left join sys_menu pm on pm.id = m.parent_id
and m.platform = #{platform} and m.del_flag = 0 and m.visible = 0 and m.type != 'F'
order by m.order_num, m.create_time desc

select m.*, pm.name parentName from sys_menu m left join sys_menu pm on pm.id = m.parent_id
and m.platform = #{platform} and m.del_flag = 0 and m.visible = 0 and m.type = 'F'
order by m.order_num, m.create_time desc

select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id
and m.platform = 1 and m.status = 0 and m.visible = 0 and rm.role_id = #{roleId}

select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role r on r.id = ur.role_id
and m.platform = 1 and m.status = '0' and r.status = '0' and ur.user_id = #{userId}
